name: Simple Chicken Curry
instructions: Dice the chicken breast into 1-inch cubes
Finely chop the onion and garlic
Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat
Sauté onion and garlic until soft and translucent, about 3-4 minutes
Add chicken and cook until no longer pink, about a 5-6 minutes
Add curry powder and stir for 1 minute until fragrant
Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer
Reduce heat and cook for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Serve hot with rice

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil
Add spaghetti and cook according to package instructions until al dente
While pasta cooks, dice the pancetta
In a bowl, whisk eggs and mix in grated parmesan
Heat a large pan over medium heat and cook pancetta until crispy
Add minced garlic to the pancetta and cook for 30 seconds
Drain pasta, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water
Add hot pasta to the pancetta pan and toss quickly
Remove pan from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce
Season with freshly ground black pepper
Serve immediately with extra parmesan cheese

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Prepare all vegetables and set aside
In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, and water to make the sauce
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant
Add harder vegetables first (carrots, broccoli), stir-fry for 2 minutes
Add bell peppers and mushrooms, stir-fry for another 2 minutes
Add snap peas and stir-fry for 1 minute
Pour in the sauce and toss until vegetables are coated and sauce thickens
Serve hot with rice or noodles

name: Classic Beef Lasagna
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat
Add onion, carrot, and celery, and cook until soft, about 5 minutes
Add garlic and cook for another minute
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon
Add tomato paste and stir for 1 minute
Add crushed tomatoes, oregano, and basil, then simmer for 30 minutes
Meanwhile, mix ricotta cheese with egg, salt, and pepper
If using dried lasagna noodles, cook according to package instructions
In a 9x13 inch baking dish, spread a thin layer of meat sauce
Layer lasagna noodles, 1/3 of the ricotta mixture, 1/3 of the remaining meat sauce, and 1/4 of the mozzarella and parmesan
Repeat layers twice more, ending with noodles, sauce, and remaining cheese
Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes
Remove foil and bake for another 25 minutes until bubbly and golden
Let stand for 15 minutes before serving

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Heat vegetable stock in a saucepan and keep warm
In a large, wide pan, heat olive oil over medium heat
Add onion and cook until soft and translucent, about 3-4 minutes
Add garlic and cook for another minute
Add mushrooms and cook until they release moisture and begin to brown, about 5 minutes
Add rice and stir to coat with oil, toasting for about 2 minutes
Pour in wine and stir until absorbed
Add a ladle of warm stock and stir gently until absorbed
Continue adding stock one ladle at a time, stirring frequently and waiting until each addition is absorbed before adding more
Cook until rice is creamy but still al dente, about 18-20 minutes
Remove from heat and stir in butter, parmesan, and parsley
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Let stand for 2 minutes before serving

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Line baking sheets with parchment paper
In a small bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt
In a large bowl, beat butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar until creamy
Add vanilla and eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition
Gradually beat in flour mixture until just combined
Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts if using
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto prepared baking sheets, spacing 2 inches apart
Bake for 9-11 minutes until edges are golden but centers are still soft
Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes, then transfer to wire racks to cool completely

name: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over medium-high heat
Add beaten eggs and scramble until just cooked, then remove and set aside
Add remaining oil to the pan
Add diced chicken and cook until no longer pink, about 5 minutes
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant
Add carrots and peas, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until carrots begin to soften
Add cold rice, breaking up any clumps with a spatula
Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until rice is heated through
Add scrambled eggs back to the pan
Pour in soy sauce and sesame oil, toss to combine
Stir in green onions
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Serve hot

name: Greek Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine diced cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, and bell pepper
Add olives and feta cheese
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper
Pour dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine
Let sit for at least 10 minutes before serving to allow flavors to blend
Serve at room temperature

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add onion and cook until soft, about 3 minutes
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon
Drain excess fat if necessary
Add taco seasoning and 3/4 cup water
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens
Meanwhile, warm taco shells according to package directions
Prepare all toppings and place in separate serving bowls
To assemble, fill each taco shell with beef mixture
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, avocado, and cilantro
Serve with lime wedges on the side

name: Garlic Butter Salmon
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Pat salmon fillets dry with paper towels
Season both sides with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat
Place salmon fillets skin-side down in the skillet
Cook for 3 minutes until bottom is golden
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, melt butter over medium heat
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant
Stir in lemon juice and dill
Pour garlic butter over salmon fillets
Top with lemon slices
Transfer skillet to the oven and bake for 5-7 minutes until salmon is just cooked through
Remove from oven and let rest for 2 minutes
Serve hot with extra garlic butter sauce spooned over the top
